title: Rating upgrade from S&P reflects the impact of prudent fiscal policy, say economists
description:
Rating upgrade from S&P reflects the impact of prudent fiscal policy, say economists

S&P Global upgraded India's long-term sovereign credit ratings to 'BBB' from 'BBB-'. Economists have positively reacted to the upgrade, stating that it reflects on India’s prudent fiscal policy.
